title: Kannu Mandora Tech Blogs
description: A feature-rich blog application built using the MERN stack, showcasing technical content and modern web development practices.

title: Shri Ram College
description: An advanced college management system using the MERN stack, designed to streamline operations for students, teachers, and administrators.

title: Covid Stats Checker
description: A React-based web app that provides real-time COVID-19 statistics for any country, presented in a user-friendly interface.

title: MK Store
description: A sleek e-commerce platform built with Next.js, offering a seamless shopping experience for users with modern features.

title: Threads Web App
description: A social media application inspired by Instagram's Threads, built using Next.js with a focus on real-time interactions and a user-friendly design.

title: API Ninja Hub
description: A centralized platform created with Next.js for accessing and showcasing APIs, making it a hub for developers and integrations.
